name: Start a migration
description: Initiates the generation of a migration archive.

params.name: repositories
params.description: **Required**. A list of arrays indicating which repositories should be migrated.

params.name: lock_repositories
params.description: Indicates whether repositories should be locked (to prevent manipulation) while migrating data.

params.name: exclude_attachments
params.description: Indicates whether attachments should be excluded from the migration (to reduce migration archive file size).

name: Get the status of a migration
description: Fetches the status of a migration.

name: Download a migration archive
description: Fetches the URL to a migration archive.

name: Delete a migration archive
description: Deletes a previous migration archive. Migration archives are automatically deleted after seven days.

name: Unlock a repository
description: Unlocks a repository that was locked for migration. You should unlock each migrated repository and [delete them](/v3/repos/#delete-a-repository) when the migration is complete and you no longer need the source data.
